main event: Two independent observers reported seeing 6 orange or amber colored discs circling each other in an elliptical path.
interesting points: The objects were observed through field glasses for about 10 minutes before disappearing., The discs moved in a precise elliptical path., One witness described the objects as being bright silver or shiny aluminum., The size of the discs was estimated to be about 30 to 100 feet across., While hovering, the discs appeared to be spinning slowly counterclockwise.
sighted object: six orange or amber colored discs
witness description: Mrs. (XXXXX), age 39, housewife and teacher, estimated to be reliable.
